text: Approval for the sprinter legend rapid exchange balloon dilatation catheter.  The device, as modified, is indicated for balloon dilatation of the stenotic portion of a coronary artery or bypass graft stenosis for the purpose of improving myocardial perfusion.  The balloon dilatation catheter (balloon models 2.25 mm  4.0 mm) is also indicated for post-delivery expansion of balloon expandable stents.
